BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE pg_details_add_trn t SET t.NUM_FLAG_ID=?,t.num_ca_forwarded_to_gc=?,t.NUM_CATEGORY_ID=?,t.NUM_COMMITTEE_ID=?,t.str_ca_corrective_action=?,t.dt_ca_corrective_date=?,t.str_ca_corrective_time=?,t.str_ca_final_action=?,t.GNUM_SLNO_GC_CODE=?, t.STR_GRIEVANCE_STATUS=?,t.GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID=? where t.str_grievance_sequence_no=? and t.GNUM_SLNO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE pg_details_add_trn t SET t.NUM_FLAG_ID=?,t.str_gc_corrective_action=?,t.str_gc_corrective_date=?,t.str_gc_corrective_time=?,t.str_gc_remarks=?,t.str_acti_taken_rpt_to_ca=?,t.GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE t.str_grievance_sequence_no=? and t.GNUM_SLNO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE pg_details_add_trn t SET t.NUM_FLAG_ID=?,t.str_ca_disp_fnl_action=?,t.dt_ca_dispose_date=?,t.str_ca_dispose_time=?, t.STR_GRIEVANCE_STATUS=?,t.GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID=?,t.str_acti_taken_rpt_to_ca=? WHERE t.str_grievance_sequence_no=? and t.GNUM_SLNO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PG_EMP_GRIEV T SET T.STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=? WHERE T.STR_EMP_ID=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PG_EMP_GRIEV T SET T.STR_GRIEVANCE_STATUS=?,STR_SEQUENCE_NO=?,GNUM_SLNO=? WHERE T.STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PG_DETAILS_ADD_TRN SET STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=?,GNUM_SLNO=?,STR_COMPLAINER_ADDRESS=?,STR_COMPLAINER_CITY=?,STR_COMPLAINER_STATE=?,STR_COMPLAINER_PIN_CODE=?,STR_COMPLAINER_CONTACT_NO=?,STR_COMPLAINER_EMAIL_ID=?,STR_EMAIL_IDENTIFICATION_NO=?,NUM_MODE_OF_ID=? WHERE STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1

UPDATE PG_DETAILS_ADD_MAPPING SET STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=?,GNUM_SLNO=?,STR_COMPLAINT_ADDRESS=?,STR_COMPLAINT_CITY=?,STR_COMPLAINT_STATE=?,STR_COMPLAINT_PIN_CODE=?,STR_COMPLAINT_CONTACT_NO=?,STR_COMPLAINT_EMAIL_ID=? WHERE STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PG_EMP_GRIEV SET STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=?,GNUM_SLNO=? WHERE STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PG_DETAILS_ADD_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0,STR_GRIEVANCE_STATUS=? WHERE STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PG_DETAILS_ADD_MAPPING SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_GRIEVANCE_SEQUENCE_NO=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PG_EMP_GRIEV SET STR_GRIEVANCE_STATUS=? WHERE STR_SEQUENCE_NO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
